front.title: Information Model for Wavelength Switched Optical Networks (WSONs) with Impairments Validation

abstract.t: This document defines an information model to support Impairment- Aware (IA) Routing and Wavelength Assignment (RWA) function. This operation might be required in Wavelength Switched Optical Networks (WSON) that already support RWA and the information model defined here goes in addition and it is fully compatible with the already defined information model for impairment-free RWA process in WSON. This information model shall support all control plane architectural options defined for WSON with impairment validation.
